entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Wreckhouse

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 1:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Wind: ESE 16 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning after midnight then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 increasing to 80 gusting to 110 except gusting to 150 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Freezing rain inland early in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 80 km/h gusting to 110 except gusting to 150 in the Wreckhouse area in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 near noon then southwest 30 gusting to 50. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
